titles.title: O Breath Of Life (Awesome, Amazing & easy )

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh Breath of Life Come sweeping through us Revive Thy church With life and power Oh Breath of Life Come cleanse renew us And fit Thy church To meet this hour{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh Wind of God Come bend us break us Till humbly We confess our need Then in Thy tenderness Remake us Revive restore For this we plead{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh Breath of Love Come breathe within us Renewing thought And will and heart Come love of Christ Afresh to win us Revive Thy church In every part{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh heart of Christ Once broken for us Tis there we find Our strength and rest Our broken contrite hearts Now solace And let Your waiting church Be blest{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Revive us Lord Is zeal abating While harvest fields Are vast and white Revive us Lord The world is waiting Equip Thy church To spread the light{/lang-eng}
